column2: but well worth it for the experience. Servers really take their time making the experience special. We had 8 dishes
column4: and shag roll which were delicious
column5: a roll with a scallop that was like butter
column6: and the fried chicken was an unexpected winner. For dessert we had the fried milk
column8: and the lemon sorbet- definitely save room for dessert. Fried milk is a must have! Will def be back to try everything else!
